message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI 

This paper proposes a new definition of fairness for classifiers, which is a problem in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of risk measures from mathematical finance, which could fall under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR). The optimization of the proposed objective function could involve techniques from data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and statistical inference (cs.SI).
